name: sps-delegate-dom
description: The reference delegate implementation for consuming the Scalable Pixel Streaming frontend library

scripts.symlink: cd ../../library && npm link && cd ../delegates/dom && npm link @tensorworks/libspsfrontend
scripts.build-all: cd ../../library && npm run build && cd ../delegates/dom && npm run symlink && npm run build

author: TensorWorks Pty Ltd
